entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
